table.name: civicrm_uf_group
table.comment: User framework groups. Each group represents a form which encompasses a set of fields defined in civicrm_uf_fields table. Initially will be used for CiviCRM Profile form(s). Subsequently we anticipate using this to define other public facing forms (e.g. online donation solicitation forms, mailing list preferences, etc.).

field.name: id
field.title: Profile ID
field.comment: Unique table ID

field.name: is_active
field.title: Profile Is Active
field.comment: Is this form currently active? If false, hide all related fields for all sharing contexts.

field.name: group_type
field.title: Profile Group Type
field.comment: This column will store a comma separated list of the type(s) of profile fields.

field.name: form_type
field.comment: Type of form.

field.name: title
field.comment: Form title.

field.name: description
field.title: Profile Description
field.comment: Optional verbose description of the profile.

field.name: collapse_display
field.comment: Will this group be in collapsed or expanded mode on initial display ?

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in form.

field.name: help_post
field.title: Profile Post Text
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in form.

field.name: weight
field.title: Profile Weight
field.comment: Controls display order when multiple user framework groups are setup for concurrent display.

field.name: limit_listings_group_id
field.title: Profile Search Limit Group
field.comment: Group id, foreign key from civicrm_group

field.name: post_URL
field.comment: Redirect to URL.

field.name: add_to_group_id
field.title: Add Contact To Group
field.comment: foreign key to civicrm_group_id

field.name: add_captcha
field.title: Show Captcha On Profile
field.comment: Should a CAPTCHA widget be included this Profile form.

field.name: is_map
field.title: Map Profile
field.comment: Do we want to map results from this profile.

field.name: is_edit_link
field.title: Show Edit Link?
field.comment: Should edit link display in profile selector

field.name: is_uf_link
field.title: Show Link to CMS User
field.comment: Should we display a link to the website profile in profile selector

field.name: is_update_dupe
field.title: Update on Duplicate
field.comment: Should we update the contact record if we find a duplicate

field.name: cancel_URL
field.title: Profile Cancel URL
field.comment: Redirect to URL when Cancle button clik .

field.name: is_cms_user
field.title: Create CMS User?
field.comment: Should we create a cms user for this profile

field.name: is_reserved
field.title: Profile Is Reserved
field.comment: Is this group reserved for use by some other CiviCRM functionality?

field.name: name
field.title: Profile Name
field.comment: Name of the UF group for directly addressing it in the codebase

field.name: created_id
field.title: Profile Created By
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who created this UF group

field.name: created_date
field.title: UF Group Created Date
field.comment: Date and time this UF group was created.

field.name: is_proximity_search
field.title: Include Proximity Search?
field.comment: Should we include proximity search feature in this profile search form?
